title: Visa, Mastercard Prepare to Raise Credit-Card Fees
sub_head: The increases, delayed during the pandemic, mean many merchants will pay more when shoppers use credit cards
body:
Visa Inc. and Mastercard Inc. are preparing to increase the fees that many large merchants pay when they accept consumers’ credit cards.
The fee increases—delayed during the past two years because of the pandemic—are scheduled to kick in next month, according to people familiar with the matter and a document viewed by The Wall Street Journal.
